content: [2025 | Age 22] [TextBlock(text="Just landed back in NYC, but my mind's still in Tokyo. The blend of tradition and tech there got me thinking about how we can make AI pair programming not just a tool, but a cultural bridge. Imagine coding with an AI that understands not just your code, but your cultural context too. The future's not just about lines of code; it's about the stories we tell with them.", type='text')]
